sense.gloss: small silk wrapper, small cloth for wiping tea utensils, crepe wrapper
flipping a table over in anger, overturning a table in anger
Japanese-Chinese cuisine, served family-style (large dishes, diners help themselves), specialty of Nagasaki, Chinese table cuisine
Japanese-Chinese cuisine, served family-style (large dishes, diners help themselves), specialty of Nagasaki Chinese style low dining table
soba in soup with slices of boiled fish paste, shiitake mushrooms, greens, seaweed, etc.

sdata.j: あの↑赤↑↓あか↓い↑布↑↓ぬの↓は「↑袱紗↑↓ふくさ↓」↑茶道具↑↓ちゃどうぐ↓を↑清↑↓きよ↓めるために↑使↑↓つか↓う↑必需↑↓ひつじゅ↓↑品↑↓ひん↓なの。
sdata.e: That red cloth is a "fukusa"; it is a vital tool used to cleanse the tea equipment.
